sentences.sContent: Don't be cagey or vague in headlines.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't be cagey or vague in headlines.
sentences.sCn: 不要在标题上小心谨慎和含糊不清。

synos.tran: 精明的；小心谨慎的；机灵的；有戒心的

words.tran: 小心谨慎的；机灵的（等于cagey）
精明地；谨慎小心地；狡诈地

trans.tranCn: 谨慎小心的, 精明的
trans.tranOther: unwilling to tell people about your plans, intentions, or opinions
